title: [Kizun's Armory]
[Kizun's Outfitting]
description: Beneath a swirl-painted white stucco ceiling, a curl-edged vellum wall map hangs on one of the painted white plaster walls.  A set of carved felwood shelves and a long carved oak counter sit in opposite corners while a plush black bear fur rug rests on a varnished dark oak floor.
